title: Network of Layer 2 Networks
sub-title: Tokamak Network helps people joining the decentralized world

challenge.title: Challenge
challenge.content1: Ethereum, a powerful platform for decentralized applications, has limitations.
challenge.content2: Various Layer2 solutions are emerging in effort to tackle such challenges. All layer2 solutions are excellnt; however, a protocol that safely connects different layer2 solutions to expand and improve the ecosystem does not exist yet. This slows down the application and improvement of layer 2, causing fragmentation of the ecosystem.

comparison.title: Comparison
comparison.description: Simple comparison with other L2 protocols or frameworks

opru.title: Optimistic Rollups
opru.description: Layer-2 solution with on-chain data off-chain computated. Its validity is verified with fraud-proof system

zk-rollup.title: zk Rollups
zk-rollup.description: Layer-2 solution with on-chain data off-chain computated. Its validity is always fully verified with validity proof(a.k.a. zero knowledge proof)

plasma.title: Tokamak Plasma
plasma.description: Fully EVM-compatible Plasma implementation secured with continuous-rebase

solution.title: Solution
solution.content1: Tokamak Network is a network of Layer 2 networks, a protocol and platform that easily and securely builds and connects On-Demand Layer 2.
solution.list2: Support all types of layer 2 protocols
solution.list3: Ensure full verification from day one within Tokamak Network ecosystem
solution.list4: Support interoperability via Cross-layer Message Protocol
